5.53.text: this is a guided body scan for

8.73.text: healing your mind, body and spirit

19.01.text: a healing light will flood over your body

22.14.text: from your feet to your head

28.26.text: this meditation has been made with intentions of healing

33.28.text:
and feelings of unconditional love and
compassion

43.43.text: after it was written, a prayer and meditation was spoken over it

47.96.text:
so that the light and healing energy is
always active

51.35.text:
whenever you choose to use this
particular meditation

65.29.text: before we begin, you'll relax with some breathing exercises

71.50.text: you may either sit or lie down, whichever is most comfortable for you

77.95.text:
if you wish to go to sleep after, the
meditation can  be used when you go to bed

90.10.text: now, close your eyes and lay one of your hands on your solar plexus

103.20.text: take the deepest breath that you can

115.44.text: imagine that a healing light is beginning to shine

120.02.text: and that each breath you take, you inhale some of this light

132.04.text: hold your breath for a few seconds and then breathe out

136.92.text: the healing light attached itself to your lungs

144.42.text: exhale the old air and draw in gleaming light

160.45.text: now the light intensifies, beginning at your feet

171.23.text: you may imagine it coming from the heart of the universe

177.45.text:
whatever works for you. Anything you
imagine will work effectively

185.49.text: the light is a radiant white

188.04.text: like moon beams falling onto snow,

191.06.text: yet warm as lying in the Sun

200.64.text:
the light slides through your skin into
your bones and blood

204.67.text:
into the very atoms that make up your
body

213.12.text:
when it touches anything that
requires healing,

219.04.text: its particles dispersing where they are needed

229.10.text: the healing light works at a far deeper level than we can see

237.54.text: slowly, the light moves up your lower legs to your knees

249.64.text: into your fingertips and up your arms

259.00.text:
where it passes, it leaves a
feeling of gentleness

269.42.text: you may feel tingling, the sensations of warmth

278.94.text: pouring in to your lower stomach and pelvic area

287.44.text: working on that deepest levels of your cells

290.50.text: bursting apart any darkness to fill the complex workings of your body

314.55.text: it is an unstoppable force, fashioned out of the mystery and power of the universe

327.16.text: it flows upwards into your abdomen

338.38.text: sinking through the surface of your body

341.41.text: to cleanse each organ, bone, tissue and blood

351.46.text: the light rises to your throat

368.73.text: here, it will also treat the symptoms of your mind

373.26.text:
those thoughts or memories that are not
helpful

378.84.text: as the light heals and cleanses

393.00.text:
all of them are positive, have meaning for
you,

401.18.text: it is like shining a torch into a dark room

405.18.text: all that is not positive or good for your life, is illuminated

419.58.text: push these thoughts towards the light

422.76.text:
and see them melt away into
nothingness

433.37.text:
feel relief in the knowledge that you
can easily herd them

439.66.text: and let it deal with them

450.63.text:
any thoughts that may have been holding
you back

454.02.text: that have not helped you in the past

463.60.text: and watch as this beautiful white energy

480.80.text:
notice now, an increasing sense of
relief

485.24.text:
a growing blissful lightness in your
being

489.54.text: as you watch this baggage disappear

566.22.text: Now, let this beautiful light warm your spirit with love,

578.20.text: let it speak to your soul

582.34.text: that you are loved, beyond measure

609.02.text: you are a part of the universe that sees,

612.50.text: feels, speaks, experiences life on our world

619.62.text: you are incredible and can never be alone

651.81.text:
of all the gifts life can bestow
upon you

680.77.text:
if you are feeling emotional at this point
in the healing,

687.76.text: simply accept all that you feel

715.72.text: the light encompasses all of you

720.20.text: it feels like lying under the radiance of summer

725.08.text: but this light soaks you through to the very strands of your DNA

730.84.text: making every part of you shine

748.46.text: not separate from it at all, but part of it

781.20.text: There is peace in your life

784.04.text: There is hope in your life

803.62.text: the light forms like a jewel in your solar plexus

808.14.text: beaming its power out like a star in a dark sky

817.40.text: feel the energy that rests there

820.64.text: that you can call upon at any time to beam through your body and mind with healing

844.80.text: The light draws into this bright knot of healing

849.56.text: leaving the rest of your body warm and relaxed

861.30.text: you may sleep at this point

863.76.text: or gently take a few deep breaths
